#summary Learn about shortcuts and setting of the SEA3D Player.
#labels SEA3D,Player

= SEA3D Player  =

Mode1: http://www.sunag.com.br/sea3d/

Mode2: http://www.sunag.com.br/sea3d/?forcecpu=true&shadow=cascade

== Shortcuts == 

   * Move the camera: *Arrows keys or W,A,S and D*
   * Change of camera: *C*
   * Change the Post-Processing effect: *Page Down and Page Up*
   * Change the animation speed: *- or +*
   * Change the animation: *0 at 9*

== Parameters ==

You can also join parameters as *`?forcecpu=false&shadow=none`*

=== forcecpu ===

Enables or disables the use of the GPU for animation.
_If contained in the file SEA3D._

*
  * true *(default)*
  * false
*

*Example:* http://www.sunag.com.br/sea3d/?forcecpu=false

=== shadow ===

Set the type of shadow to be displayed.
_If contained in the file SEA3D._

*
  * none
  * near *(default)*
  * cascade
*

*Example:* http://www.sunag.com.br/sea3d/?shadow=none

=== fog ===

Enables or disables fog in the scene. 
_If contained in the file SEA3D._

*
  * true *(default)*
  * false
*

*Example:* http://www.sunag.com.br/sea3d/?fog=false

=== load ===

Opens a SEA3D file from a URL.

*
  * url
*

*Example:* http://www.sunag.com.br/sea3d/?load=http://www.sunag.com.br/sea3d/soccerreflect.sea&forcecpu=true&shadow=cascade
